```{r flc9-1, echo=FALSE, results="markup"}
askMC(
  "Which of the following functions is $\\int a + bx dx$? (Hint: Differentiate each of them until you find the one that matches $a + bx$.)",
  "+$ax + \frac{1}{2}b x^2 + C$+", 
  "$ax + 2b x^2 + C$" = "The derivative of this is $a + 4b x$, not $a + bx$.",
  "$a + b x^2 + C$" = "The derivative of this is $2 b x$, not $a + bx$."
)
```

```{r flc9-2, echo=FALSE, results="markup"}
askMC(
  "Which of the following functions is $\\int e^{-kx} dt$?",
  "+$ - \\frac{1}{k} e^{-kx}$+",
  "$- k e^{-k x}$",
  "$\\frac{1}{k} e^{-kx}$"
)
```
